page.title: 09My School Year -Autumn Term
page.content: I started my school year in September in class 2. Mrs.Brown is the class teacher.In October we started ice skating,which was good,then something special happened.We were asked to the Ice Gala in Gillingham and we saw the Queen,the Duke of Edinburgh and some famous skaters.On October 31st we had a Hallowe'en Party and in November we planted a woodland and our photo went in the paper.Our topic for the first term was the Arabs,and time and tune was Hansel and Gretel and we watched Badger Girl on television.At Christmas we dressed as children from around the world for our concert and we had a party with lots of food.Mrs.Rosa, one of our teachers, retired and when we gave her some presents we were all sad.
